biolockj.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.BioLockJUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends Object
    Simple utility containing String manipulation and formatting functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String formatDigits(Integer input, Integer numDigits)
      This method formats the input number to have a length of at least numDigits.
      Simply add leading zeros until numDigits is reached.
      static String formatPercentage(long num, long denom)
      Build the percentage display string for the num/denom ratio as "##.##%"
      static List<String> getClassNames(Collection<?> objs)
      Return an ordered list of the class names from the input collection.
      static String getCollectionAsString(Collection<?> data)
      Concatenate data and return as a comma separated String.
      static List<String> getFilePaths(Collection<File> files)
      Return an ordered list of absolute file paths from the input collection.

    • Method Detail

      • formatDigits

        public static String formatDigits(Integer input,
                                  Integer numDigits)
        This method formats the input number to have a length of at least numDigits.
        Simply add leading zeros until numDigits is reached.
        Parameters:
        input - Integer value
        numDigits - Number of digits return value should contain
        Returns:
        number as String with leading zeros.

      • formatPercentage

        public static String formatPercentage(long num,
                                      long denom)
        Build the percentage display string for the num/denom ratio as "##.##%"
        Parameters:
        num - Numerator
        denom - Denominator
        Returns:
        ratio

      • getClassNames

        public static List<String> getClassNames(Collection<?> objs)
        Return an ordered list of the class names from the input collection.
        Parameters:
        objs - Objects
        Returns:
        List of class names

      • getCollectionAsString

        public static String getCollectionAsString(Collection<?> data)
        Concatenate data and return as a comma separated String.
        Parameters:
        data - Collection of data
        Returns:
        Collection data as a String

      • getFilePaths

        public static List<String> getFilePaths(Collection<File> files)
        Return an ordered list of absolute file paths from the input collection.
        Parameters:
        files - Files
        Returns:
        List of file paths
